Package graphics

package graphics
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Display
    A class for creating a JFrame to display the game.
    Renderer
    A custom "wrapper class" for the Graphics2D object.
    Sprite
    A class that represents a sprite, an image to be drawn to the screen.
    SpriteManager
    The class that handles the loading and managing of all game sprites.
